channel.title: Mafia wars
channel.description: this is a application on myspace who plays it? what lvl are you? !!! this game is fun, and if anybody here plays it, how do you get weapons like c4 automatic rifle tactical shotgun, knife and more? do you get from special missions that you loot.?

item.title: Mafia wars
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“army_life, post:7, topic:236160”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=311562.msg2485429#msg2485429 date=1223779362]
Level 52.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 08:43:31 pm[/size][hr][quote author=nohope link=topic=311562.msg2484500#msg2484500 date=1223741636]
this is a application on myspace
who plays it?
what lvl are you?
!!!
this game is fun, and if anybody here plays it, how do you get weapons like c4 automatic rifle tactical shotgun, knife and more?
do you get from special missions that you loot.?
[/quote]
You get the items from loot and when you fight people (small percent chance of finding something).
[/quote]

Well you get them from doing jobs. Ive never got one from fighting people.[/quote]
Jobs = Loot.
I’ve gotten RPG launchers and heaps of shit from fighting.

Read full topic
